pages.text: This large, portable buzzsaw is designed to make quick work of trees and other pieces of foliage that may stand in the way of a pristine factory building.$(br2)After using the $(l:essentials/workbench_and_blueprints)Engineer's Workbench$() to place a sawblade in it, and loading it with $(l:patchouli:electric_machines/refinery)Biodiesel$() or another fuel, it can be used to carve through everything from small birches to large jungle trees.

Like some other tools, the buzzsaw can be modified in the $(l:essentials/workbench_and_blueprints)Engineer's Workbench$(). These upgrades affect the size of the internal tank and the durability of its sawblade.

By replacing the normal saw- blade with a $(#007500)Rockcutter Blade$(), the buzzsaw can be used to cleanly cut cubes of stone from the ground, much like the $(#007500)Silk Touch enchantment$(). However, the diamond tipped blade is no longer useful in carving through wood or felling trees.
The $(#007500)Large Tank$() increases the fluid capacity of the buzzsaw by 2000 mb.

pages.title: Lubrication System
pages.text: The $(#007500)Advanced Lubrication System$() applies additional lubricant to the sawblade, reducing the speed at which it loses durability.
By attaching the $(#007500)Blade Quiver$() to the side of the buzzsaw, you can carry two additional sawblades along.
You can cycle between the stored blades by sneaking and using the scrollwheel, or through use of the keybind Switch Chemthrower Tanks if it has been set in the options.
